In February, 1835, after completing its survey duties along the southern Chilean coast, the Beagle stopped briefly at the port of Valdivia.

Of course

we can’t skip

the chance to collect insects here as well.

Couldn’t we rest a bit first?

Here, Darwin experienced an earthquake for the first time. It jolted the ground and destroyed buildings.

The ground! What’s happening?

This must be

what they call

an earthquake.

Earthquake?

The earth really shook! It really shook!

The two-minute long earthquake left

the city in shambles.

I had no idea an earthquake could cause this much damage.

110
